channel.title: NerwScape 637-639!
channel.description:
Welcome To NerwScape's Amazing World! Server Features : -Yanille Home. -Corp -Good Emotes -Starter Package! -Bank Tabs -Veng -Barrage -Curses -Yell -Dungeoneering Cape's! -Friend Chat Works! -Guthix Mages -New Custom Shop Area,add shops urself.
SORRY DELETED SOME PICTURES...
SORRY HERE WASN'T INFORMATION FOR MUCH,Here is some more : About our history : We have been rsps on many revisions and two name called "DerwentX" and "Nerwscape" and we have had many Good And Knightsloyal Players,Special Thanks to Them and our all Beta Testers/Helpers.. as one is called "Frozen" 1% Credits to him! :p
How people's Comment To Nerwscape Releases? : There is Many Good Comments and Also some bad comments as in every release's.. but some says u should edit more these,but now i have edited these more but One thing i wanna Talk you with is that Nerwscape v1.5 and features of it. As i told there added Bandos,Saradomin,Zamorak Bosse's,Added npc's to home,New Shops,New Commands. Not much but its Better Than v1.0 or whatever other Thinks.. :)
I hope i Get More Good Comments XD .. Thanks For Reading This Everyone! 562 Coming SOON! In Server Some important commands! : For Curses do ::curses true For veng do ::Lunar for ancients do ::ancients! Thanks. (Sorry i deleted home picture was,sorry ill add again later,but HOME IS IN YANILLE! [IMG]http://i1270.photobucket.com/albums/jj601/im1prins1/tabsWorking100.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1270.photobucket.com/albums/jj601/im1prins1/veng.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1270.photobucket.com/albums/jj601/im1prins1/ownagetraining.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1270.photobucket.com/albums/jj601/im1prins1/Corp.png[/img]
Okay There Was Some Pictures! Hope You Enjoyed! I havent Coded This Source 100% but Much!
Credits About This : Me For Adding Things,Fixing Errors,Removing Bullsh*t,And Stuff like That! Judostar1 for the Source what i started Coding/Making. Thanks! -Akimbo :)
Downloads : Client : http://uppit.com/hvpbe0t8enhm/NerwScape_639_Client.rar Source : http://uppit.com/qjf33clyvsnp/NerwScape_639_Source.rar Source Over 150 Downloads! Thanks all! Client Over 160 Downloads! Thanks all!
